name: A house without a fire
description:
Description

A house without a fire just isn’t the same. It never feels quite right. It never feels alive.

Collect wood from the forest and burn it in at home to keep you house alive.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left Click - Pick up wood / Drop wood / Burn wood

Escape - Exit

A note from the developer:

Thanks for taking a look at this game I made for Ludum Dare 46. This was created in 48 hours from scratch by one guy so pardon the rough edges. I'm a developer by trade so this was a great excuse for me to work on my art skills. I had a lot of fun making this but I unfortunately ran out of time and so this game is clearly unfinished. I encourage you to download it, try it out and let me know what you think.
